results.title: Metformin, age-related cognitive decline, and brain pathology.
results.text_hl: However, in additional analyses, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ users had higher odds of @DISEASE_Cerebral_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D002544 @@@subcortical infarcts@@@, and lower odds of @DISEASE_Atherosclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@atherosclerosis@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Arteriosclerosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001161 @@@arteriosclerosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Sood A, Capuano AW, Wilson RS, Barnes LL, Kapasi A, Bennett DA, Arvanitakis Z. Metformin, age-related cognitive decline, and brain pathology. Neurobiol Aging. 2023 Oct 17;133():99-106. PMID: 37931533

results.title: [Study of metformin in experimental arteriosclerosis (plasma lipoproteins, platelets, arteries and the pancreas)].
results.text_hl: [Study of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in experimental @<m>DISEASE_Arteriosclerosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001161 @@@arteriosclerosis@@@ (plasma lipoproteins, platelets, arteries and the pancreas)].

citations.NLM: Weber G, Losi M, Shore B, Shore V, Ghiselli GC, Sirtori CR. [Study of metformin in experimental arteriosclerosis (plasma lipoproteins, platelets, arteries and the pancreas)]. Journ Annu Diabetol Hotel Dieu. 1977;():228-43. PMID: 894866

results.title: Metformin use among individuals at risk for type 2 diabetes.
results.text_hl: The combination of diet and exercise followed by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in the early phase of "@DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@insulin resistance@@@" may reduce or delay both @DISEASE_Atherosclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@atherosclerosis@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Arteriosclerosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001161 @@@arteriosclerosis@@@ complications associated with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@.

citations.NLM: Kuller LH. Metformin use among individuals at risk for type 2 diabetes. Curr Diab Rep. 2012 Jun;12(3):265-73. PMID: 22399368
